title: Episode #29: Former CIA and FBI Counterterrorism Official  Philip Mudd Interviewed at Brookings by Bruce Riedel
itunes:title: Episode #29: Former CIA and FBI Counterterrorism Official  Philip Mudd Interviewed at Brookings by Bruce Riedel
itunes:subtitle: Brookings Senior Fellow Bruce Riedel interviews before an audience Philip Mudd, former CIA and FBI counterterrorism official and author of a new book on the the hunt for Al Qaeda.
description:
Brookings Senior Fellow Bruce Riedel interviews before an audience Philip Mudd, former CIA and FBI counterterrorism official and author of a new book on the the hunt for Al Qaeda.
